author: Nation World News Desk
title: This Is The Deep Meaning Of Having A Garland Plant In Your Home And Very Few People Know It
text: plant Mala or Rasi Mala is a very special garland, its leaves hang like beads from a pearl necklace or locket and are widely used in home decoration. It is worth noting that this species also works to purify the air and improve the temperature of the environment, because it absorbs heat. This vegetable originated in South Africa feng shui It has a special meaning. According to feng shui, an ancient traditional Chinese practice, the succulent is an element to attract good luck and positive energy into the home. In that sense, there is plants Ones that attract wealth and prosperity, others help in creating a good atmosphere in the home. We tell you what the presence of a pink plant in the house indicates. Why should you have a garland plant in your home? according to him feng shuiThe plant Mala is supposed to bring good luck and positive energy. These types of succulents, by capturing and transforming sunlight, fill homes with vitality, harmony and abundance. That is why its care is essential, as a sick species can negatively affect the energy flow of the home. It is important to know the ideal places to place these in the interior spaces of the house. He feng shui It is advisable to place them in well-lit places, near windows, on balconies or in strategic locations. It also recommends placing them diagonally at the main door, in the hallway or near electronic devices, which helps absorb negative energy. Like most succulents, plant The rosary should not be overwatered, as this can cause its roots to rot and die. You should do this only when the soil is completely dry. It produces small white flowers with a sweet aroma similar to cinnamon or vanilla, although flowering is not very common in indoor environments. (TagstoTranslate)FengShui(T)Positive Energy(T)Lush

author: @nzherald
title: Hawke's Bay coastline battered by big swells
text:
Homeowners on the Hawke’s Bay coast are bracing for a rough night as large swells pound the shoreline due to a low-pressure system to the east of the North Island.
MetService meteorologist Mmathapelo Makgabutlane said a combination of the swell generated around the low-pressure system and strong southerly winds creating wind waves on top of the swell are causing treacherous conditions.
“We’re seeing those waves for the rest of [Thursday] and it looks like the highest waves we’re expecting are ... a couple of hours around high tide [at 12.15am Friday],” she said.
Following high tide, the waves should slowly start to ease off into Friday afternoon and going into Saturday.

author: VNExplorer
title: Frente Frío 20 AVANZA sobre México y provoca caída de AGUANIEVE y LLUVIA HELADA: Conagua
text:
Caída de aguanieve, lluvias heladas y altos oleajes se esperan el día de hoy, 29 de diciembre, en todo México por el Frente Frío 20 de acuerdo a la Conagua.
El Servicio Meteorológico Nacional de la Conagua informó el pronóstico del día de hoy por el Frente Frío 20 que llegó a territorio mexicano desde este jueves.
Según la Conagua, el Frente Frío 20 traerá caída de aguanieve y lluvia engelante, es decir, lluvias que al caer se congelan y provocan heladas.
El Frente Frío 20 se extiende sobre el Mar Caribe y el sur de México para mantener lluvias fuertes en el noreste de México y la Península de Yucatán.
En los estados de Puebla, Veracruz, Tabasco, Oaxaca y Chiapas se esperan lluvias muy fuertes a puntuales intensas, mientras que en el norte y centro del país se esperan chubascos y lluvias aisladas.
De acuerdo a la Conagua, el Frente Frío 20 trae consigo el evento de “Norte” con oleajes de dos a cuatro metros de altura en el Golfo de Tehuantepec y oleajes de uno a dos metros de altura en costas de Tamaulipas, Veracruz, Tabasco y la Península de Yucatán.
Para la sierra de Coahuila y los estados de Nuevo León, Tamaulipas y San Luis Potosí se espera caída de aguanieve o lluvia congelante.
El Frente Frío 20 se mantendrá hasta el domingo 31 de diciembre, donde la Conagua prevé que se una a otro Frente Frío que acecha a México.

author: Camila França
title: Vaticano cancela agenda do Papa de final de semana com fiéis
text:
>
Vaticano cancela agenda do Papa de final de semana com fiéis
Medida foi tomada após o anúncio de que o pontífice deve permanecer internado mais tempo que o previsto inicialmente devido a um quadro "complexo"
Ansa - O Vaticano cancelou nesta terça-feira (18) uma audiência do papa Francisco com fiéis marcada para o próximo sábado (22), no âmbito do Jubileu católico de 2025. A medida foi tomada após o anúncio de que o pontífice de 88 anos deve permanecer internado no Hospital Policlínico Agostino Gemelli, em Roma, mais tempo que o previsto inicialmente devido a um quadro "complexo".
"Por causa das condições de saúde do Santo Padre, a audiência jubilar de 22 de fevereiro foi anulada", diz um comunicado da Sala de Imprensa da Santa Sé. "Para a celebração da Santa Missa por ocasião do Jubileu dos Diáconos, programada para 23 de fevereiro, o papa Francisco designou o monsenhor Rino Fisichella, pró-prefeito do Dicastério para a Evangelização", acrescenta a nota.
Jorge Bergoglio está internado desde a última sexta-feira (14) devido a uma bronquite, e os exames mais recentes apontaram uma "infecção polimicrobiana nas vias respiratórias, que determinou uma nova mudança no tratamento". "Todos os exames realizados até o momento indicam um quadro clínico complexo e que exigirá uma internação hospitalar adequada", ressalta a nota.
Segundo fontes próximas a Francisco, ele passou mais uma "noite tranquila" no 10º andar do Agostino Gemelli e está de "bom humor". Na última segunda-feira (17), manteve a rotina de telefonar para a paróquia da Sagrada Família, na Faixa de Gaza, para se atualizar sobre a situação no enclave palestino.

author: Our Staff Reporter
title: Dengue cases decline as temperature dips in Punjab
text: LAHORE - In a positive turn of events, a recent drop in the temperature across Punjab has led to a significant decrease in dengue cases with just three cases on Sunday. Health Department data released on Sunday indicates a total of 15,185 confirmed cases reported across 36 districts in Punjab throughout the year 2023. The city-wise breakdown reveals that Lahore remains the most affected, with 7,029 cases, followed by Rawalpindi with 2,654, Gujranwala with 1,591, Multan with 1,464, and Faisalabad with 918 cases. However, in the last 24 hours, Lahore reported only two cases, while Faisalabad reported one. Ali Jaan Khan, Secretary of Health Punjab, issued a heartfelt plea to citizens, emphasizing the importance of maintaining clean and dry surroundings as a preventive measure against dengue. He urged cooperation with health department teams actively working to combat the outbreak. For those seeking dengue treatment, information, or wanting to lodge complaints, a free helpline is available through the health department at 1033.
